doc.description: A new instance of the class must be created for each item to be added. Required fields are the item name, description, quantity and price The private-data and tax-selector for each item can be set in the constructor call or using individual Set functions
doc.shortdescription: Creates an item to be added to the shopping cart.

doc.parameter: the name of the item -- required
the description of the item -- required
the number of units of this item the customer has in its shopping cart -- required
the unit price of the item -- required
the weight unit used to specify the item's weight, one of 'LB' (pounds) or 'KG' (kilograms)
the value that identifies this item on the merchant's side
